item.title: today is awesome
item.description: I saw a post in friendster about sad songs - or songs that make you cry and I thought about making a mood song db. but instead I just reposted the sad song list on ironkungfu. check it out here. please add some of your own. i am going to add a del.icio.us plugin to my site soon. it should rule. then you all can see what I am lookign at.
